channel.title: Over asked question - asked again
channel.description:
I just got a new router and it's not allowing people to connect to my server.
i disabled the fire but i know its the router.
i looked in the list of routers but they don't have mine listed, the closest they have listed is the model, not the brand.
Do i use it?
and after i use it i need help setting up the things like start port end port ect.
iv already read the guid but i dont get it.

item.title: Over asked question - asked again
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Nick1 Mod Nick
item.description:
@Mod_Nick1 wrote:

and on portforward.com what do i say im portforwarding for?[br][br][quote=“zilchuary, post:4, topic:159973”]just open port 43594[/quote]

i dont know how.

Read full topic

item.title: Over asked question - asked again
item.dc:creator: @xxdanxx135 xxdanxx135
item.description:
@xxdanxx135 wrote:

Here is a quick guide to success

  1. Open a command prompt and type ipconfig/all
  2. Look for the defualt gateway, and type that ip on the adress bar.
  3. You may need a static ip
  4. To make one do the ipconfig thing once more, and look for you’r dns servers plurel!
  5. Then open internet connections then properties on you’r used land line.
  6. Then click internet protical (tcp/ip)
  7. For the up do what it says to on the port forward guide.
  8. Defualt gateways and dns servers type what you see on the command prompt.
  9. Then hit ok, then go back to router and find the "port forward/target part
  10. Then type the name or something then use the last “3” digits of you’r ip that you made for you’r static and click ok. save. The port rangers are 43594-43594! That’s all i’m helping with, i will not post again. Any questions contact me at timman275@hotmail.com

Read full topic
